PAGE_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: 404 - Page Not Found
PAGE_NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: The page you were looking for could not be found.

VIDEO_NOT_FOUND.TITLE: 404 - Video Not Found
VIDEO_NOT_FOUND.DESCRIPTION: A video could not be found for the following id: [0].

UNKNOWN_ERROR.TITLE: 500 - Unknown Error
UNKNOWN_ERROR.DESCRIPTION: An unknown error has occurred and your request could not be completed.

NO_DATABASE_RESPONSE.TITLE: 503 - No Database Response
NO_DATABASE_RESPONSE.DESCRIPTION: There was an issue retrieving information from the server database.
